title: Gemini Eraser - Lossless Watermark Removal Tool
terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
terms.disclaimer.p1: This tool is strictly for personal, educational, and research purposes. Commercial use is prohibited.
terms.mind.title: A few things to keep in mind
terms.policy.title: Compliance with Laws
terms.policy.desc: You agree not to use this tool to infringe on intellectual property rights. You are solely responsible for the content you process and the consequences of its use.
terms.visible.title: Technical Limitations
terms.visible.desc: This tool removes visible watermarks only and does not affect invisible watermarks (e.g., SynthID). Use of this tool does not transfer copyright.
terms.privacy.title: Privacy & Data Security
terms.privacy.desc: All processing occurs locally in your browser. No images are uploaded to servers. We do not collect, store, or share your personal data or processed images.
terms.liability.title: No Warranty & Liability
terms.liability.desc: The software is provided "as is". The authors grant no warranties and assume no liability for any damages, data loss, or legal disputes arising from its use.
terms.agree: I have read, understood, and agree to these terms

upload.text: Click to select or drag images here
panel.title: Control Panel
feature.title: Features
feature.speed.title: Lightning Fast
feature.speed.desc: Based on modern browser technologies, millisecond response, no waiting queue
feature.privacy.title: Privacy First
feature.privacy.desc: Pure frontend processing, images never leave your device
feature.free.title: Completely Free
feature.free.desc: No usage limits, no hidden fees, ready to use

original.not_gemini: ⚠️ This image may not be made with Gemini. Lossless processing unavailable.
original.not_original: ⚠️ This image may not be original size. Lossless processing unavailable.
original.pass: ✅ This image made with Gemini. Lossless processing supported.
step.1.title: Upload Images
step.1.desc: Drag and drop single or multiple Gemini AI images with transparent watermarks.
step.2.title: Auto Processing
step.2.desc: Ultra-fast reverse Alpha blending algorithm running locally to instantly strip watermarks.
step.3.title: Lossless Save
step.3.desc: Preview clean images and download individually or export in bulk losslessly.
tour.upload.title: Step 1: Upload Images
tour.upload.desc: Click here or drag your Gemini AI images into the dashed box to start processing.
tour.download.title: Step 2: Download Result
tour.download.desc: Once processed, the clean image will appear here. Click download to save it locally!
